attributes.action: Award the Military Medal to the late Walter Tull The British Armys First Coloured Officer Killed in the First World War, Members of his extended family are still alive to day. And a new book was launched yesterday in his home town of Folkstone Kent. We Hope you will consider this as it is long overdue. Walter was also a footballer for Northhampton and Tottenham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir, we would like the Prime Minister to award the Military Medal to the family of Walter Tull The first black officer in the British Army to lead white troops into battle on the somme many of his troops tryed to save him but he was never found. more can be found on the internet crossing the white line.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the MOD Medal Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
